name: Config 2022 Name Card - Kelsy Gagnebin
description:
ðŸ‘‹ Hi, I'm Kelsy.

I like thinking about systems and how the micro decisions ripple out into the macro.


I'm interested in leveraging tools to help designers spend more time on what they want to be doing and working with individuals to build up design-tool confidence.


If you're at a company that is interested in teal organizations or something like Basecamp's Shape Up and are looking for someone to help facilitate building a shared understanding, I'd love to chat.
